page.title: 19Methodist Chapel
page.content: RELIGION. The Methodist Chapel by Rachel Davey. On Sunday 11 o'clock in morning there is a service at Delabole Methodist Chapel.In the morning the children go in and we have a hymn and pray. The preacher tells the children a story, then the children sing a song and we have collection.Then the children go out to Sunday School. There are 3 classes. The youngest ones do colouring. The next ones are from 6 years to 10 years.They do drawing and quizzes.The 3rd class,10 years and over,have quizzes, make up plays,do drawing and reading. At 12'o clock they finish.There is also a service at 6.00 in the evening.
